column5: Wifi, cable and washer and dryer.   The Park at Wolflin achieved a perfect Airdna score of 100 making it the # 1 listing in Amarillo, according to Airdna. In fact per Airdna, only 51 other properties in the entire US, 0.0001%, achieved this perfect score.   Located in one of Amarillo's most historic neighborhoods. Beautiful attached studio apartment with tile floors, all appliances, including washer and dryer, separate yard and patio area.
